item.title: American Tech Giants Are Slowly Cutting Off Hong Kong Internet Users
item.description: In a move that could have a significant impact on Hong Kong’s economy and innovation ecosystem, American tech giants are slowly cutting off internet users in the city. Google and OpenAI have not rolled out AI chatbots to Hong Kong, putting it alongside mainland China and North Korea.
